00039 void
00040 printMinMaxValues(){
00041 
00042   std::cout << "Minimum value for bool: " << std::numeric_limits<bool>::min() << std::endl;
00043   std::cout << "Maximum value for bool: " << std::numeric_limits<bool>::max() << std::endl;
00044   std::cout << "bool is signed: " << std::numeric_limits<bool>::is_signed << std::endl;
00045   std::cout << "Non-sign bits in bool: " << std::numeric_limits<bool>::digits << std::endl;
00046   std::cout << "bool has infinity: " << std::numeric_limits<bool>::has_infinity << std::endl;

00091 /*
00092  * write a given string, without newline
00093  * @param text: this string
00094  */
00095 void write(std::string text){
00096   std::cout << text;
00097   std::cout << std::flush;
00098 }

00100 /* \brief output a comment on a new line */
00101 /* Write a string onto a line on std::out and add a newline
00102  * @param text: comment to be printed
00103  */
00104 void writeln(std::string text){
00105   std::cout << text << std::endl;
00106   std::cout << std::flush;
00107 }

00110  * Write "done" without newline
00111  */

00118  * Write "done" with newline
00119  */

00122   std::cout << std::flush;

00125 /*
00126  * Write "done!" if DebugLevel activated
00127  */
00128 void donedebug(bool DebugLevelActivated){
00129   if(DebugLevelActivated)
00130     writelndone();
00131 }

00133 /*
00134  * Write a string onto a line on std::cout,
00135  * given that the first argument is true
00136  * @param DebugLevelActivated: boolean value determining output funcionality
00137  * @param text: std::string of desired output
00138  */
00139 void writedebug(bool DebugLevelActivated, std::string text){

00141     write(text);
00142 }

00148  * @param text: std::string of desired output
00149  */
00150 void writelndebug(bool DebugLevelActivated, std::string text){

00163 /* @brief Count the lines of a textfile */
00169 unsigned GetLineNumber(std::string filename){
00170   std::ifstream infile(filename.c_str());
00171   if(!infile)
00172     return 0;
00173   unsigned i = 0;
00174   std::string sd;
00175   while(getline(infile,sd) && sd.size()>0)
00176     ++i;
00177 
00178   infile.close();
00179   return i;
00180 }
00181 
00182 /* @brief Reverse a string */
00188 void reverse(char s[])
00189 {
00190   int c, i, j;
00191 
00192   for (i = 0, j = strlen(s)-1; i<j; i++, j--) {
00193     c = s[i];
00194     s[i] = s[j];
00195     s[j] = c;
00196   }
00197 }
00198 
00199 /* \brief Conversion int -> char[] */
00206 void itoa(int n, char s[])
00207 {
00208   int i, sign;
00209 
00210   if ((sign = n) < 0)  /* record sign */
00211     n = -n;          /* make n positive */
00212   i = 0;
00213   do {       /* generate digits in reverse order */
00214     s[i++] = n % 10 + '0';   /* get next digit */
00215   } while ((n /= 10) > 0);     /* delete it */
00216   if (sign < 0)
00217     s[i++] = '-';
00218   s[i] = '\0';
00219   reverse(s);
00220 }

00222 /* \brief Conversion int -> std::string */
00228 std::string IntToString(int intValue) {
00229   char *myBuff;
00230   std::string strRetVal;
00231   myBuff = new char[100];
00232   memset(myBuff,'\0',100);
00233 
00234   itoa(intValue,myBuff);
00235 
00236   strRetVal = myBuff;
00237   delete[] myBuff;
00238   return(strRetVal);
00239 }

00241 /* \brief returns folder position */
00247 std::string Folder(std::string where){
00248   std::string folder_amd="/data/achtland1/psteger/amd/";
00249   std::string folder_snaps = folder_amd+"snap/";
00250   std::string folder_amateur = folder_amd+"amateur/";
00251   std::string folder_output = folder_amd+"output/";
00252   std::string folder_parameters = folder_output + "parameters/";
00253   if(where=="amd")
00254     return folder_amd;
00255   else if(where=="snaps")
00256     return folder_snaps;
00257   else if(where=="amateur")
00258     return folder_amateur;
00259   else if(where=="output")
00260     return folder_output;
00261   else if(where=="parameters")
00262     return folder_parameters;
00263   else
00264     {
00265       std::cout << "Folder " << where << " not found, returning folder of amd!";
00266       return folder_amd;
00267     }
00268 }

00303 real
00304 fbmod( real x, real m ){
00305   return x - floor( x/m + 0.5 )*m;
00306 }
00307 
00308 template< typename real_t >
00309 real_t
00310 SPHK3D( const real_t r, const real_t h ){
00311   const real_t xi(r/h);
00312   const real_t norm(8.0/PI/(h*h*h));
00313 
00314   if( xi<0.5 ){
00315     return norm*(6.0*xi*xi*(xi-1.0)+1.0);
00316   } else {
00317     if( xi <= 1.0 ){
00318       real_t t(1.0-xi);
00319       return norm*2.0*t*t*t;
00320     }
00321     return 0.0;
00322   }
00323 }
